channel.title: Server error
channel.description:
FIXED ( WAS A LIL BIT NOOB BY ME THERE WHERE 20 CHARS INSTEAD OF 21) My error: ( THIS IS NOT A DELTA OR PI) [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String ind ex out of range: 21 at java.lang.String.getChars(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(Unknown Source) at PlayerHandler.savechar(PlayerHandler.java:413) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:164) at server.main(server.java:48) [/code]
Ok i use a really old 317 (funscap3) I was trying to add (Character-starter) Soo i just copied & pasted the (Character-Ismember) and changed everything then i paste if everywhere in my client.java player.java & playerhandler.java (No compiling error) I run the server go online untill it saves it crashed with the error above what can i do?
Here are the codes i used:
Player.java
[code] public int playerStarter;[/code]
Playerhandler.java
[code]characterfile.write("character-starter = ", 0, 21); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(plr.playerStarter), 0, Integer.toString(plr.playerStarter).length());[/code]
And last but not least Client.java
[code] } else if (token.equals("character-starter")) { playerStarter = Integer.parseInt(token2); }[/code]
[code] characterfile.write("character-starter = ", 0, 21); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(playerStarter), 0, Integer.toString(playerStarter).length());[/code]

item.title: Server error
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

FIXED ( WAS A LIL BIT NOOB BY ME THERE WHERE 20 CHARS INSTEAD OF 21)
My error: ( THIS IS NOT A DELTA OR PI)

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String ind ex out of range: 21 at java.lang.String.getChars(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(Unknown Source) at PlayerHandler.savechar(PlayerHandler.java:413) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:164) at server.main(server.java:48)

Ok i use a really old 317 (funscap3) I was trying to add (Character-starter) Soo i just copied & pasted the (Character-Ismember) and changed everything then i paste if everywhere in my client.java player.java & playerhandler.java (No compiling error) I run the server go online untill it saves it crashed with the error above what can i do?

Here are the codes i used:

Player.java

Playerhandler.java

characterfile.write("character-starter = ", 0, 21); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(plr.playerStarter), 0, Integer.toString(plr.playerStarter).length());

And last but not least Client.java

} else if (token.equals("character-starter")) { playerStarter = Integer.parseInt(token2); }

characterfile.write("character-starter = ", 0, 21); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(playerStarter), 0, Integer.toString(playerStarter).length());
